attributes.action: Suggest people to work from home to slow down the Corona Virus (nCov-19) spread
attributes.additional_details: Some business may don't want employees to work from home for various reasons even the work can be done remotely. Employees need clearly support from government to allow them to choose work from home without worry about being fired.
attributes.background: Government should clearly suggest people to work from home to slow down the Corona Virus (conv-19) spread for those can do the work remotely.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
